alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jackson County through 245 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lucedale to near Wade. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Point, Hurley, Wade and Vancleave. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
